com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common

Class Common

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.Common

  • public class Common
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CB_ROOT
      Defines the org.bukkit.craftbukkit constant (which is not inlined or relocated).
      static java.lang.String COMMON_ROOT
      Defines the com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common root path of this library
      static java.lang.String DEPENDENT_MC_VERSION
      The Minecraft package path version BKCommonLib is built against
      static boolean IS_COMPATIBLE
      Whether BKCommonLib is compatible with the server it is currently running on
      static boolean IS_SPIGOT_SERVER
      Gets whether the current server software used is the Spigot implementation
      static java.lang.String MC_VERSION
      Defines the Minecraft version that runs on the server.
      static java.lang.String NMS_ROOT
      Defines the net.minecraft.server constant (which is not inlined or relocated).
      static CommonServer SERVER
      Defines the type of server BKCommonLib is currently running on and provides server-specific implementations.
      static int VERSION
      BKCommonLib version number, use this to set your dependency version for BKCommonLib-using plugins
      Use getVersion() instead if you want the actual, current version!

    • Field Detail

      • VERSION

        public static final int VERSION
        BKCommonLib version number, use this to set your dependency version for BKCommonLib-using plugins
        Use getVersion() instead if you want the actual, current version! Constants get inlined when compiling!
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEPENDENT_MC_VERSION

        public static final java.lang.String DEPENDENT_MC_VERSION
        The Minecraft package path version BKCommonLib is built against
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MC_VERSION

        public static final java.lang.String MC_VERSION
        Defines the Minecraft version that runs on the server.

      • NMS_ROOT

        public static final java.lang.String NMS_ROOT
        Defines the net.minecraft.server constant (which is not inlined or relocated). Implementer note: do NOT change this to a constant or maven shading will rename it.

      • CB_ROOT

        public static final java.lang.String CB_ROOT
        Defines the org.bukkit.craftbukkit constant (which is not inlined or relocated). Implementer note: do NOT change this to a constant or maven shading will rename it.

      • COMMON_ROOT

        public static final java.lang.String COMMON_ROOT
        Defines the com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common root path of this library
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVER

        public static final CommonServer SERVER
        Defines the type of server BKCommonLib is currently running on and provides server-specific implementations.

      • IS_SPIGOT_SERVER

        public static final boolean IS_SPIGOT_SERVER
        Gets whether the current server software used is the Spigot implementation

      • IS_COMPATIBLE

        public static final boolean IS_COMPATIBLE
        Whether BKCommonLib is compatible with the server it is currently running on
